text: Fons van Wissen (21 March 19337 July 2015) was a Dutch football player. He made his debut for the Netherlands in an April 1957 friendly match against Belgium and has earned a total of 30 caps, scoring 4 goals.National team stats - Voetbalstats He represented his country in 4 FIFA World Cup qualification matches. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Dutch footballers Category:Sportspeople from Limburg (Netherlands)
title: Fons van Wissen
